content: length mid back approx 48 cm / 19 width at the top approx 137 cm / 54 materials drops inka from garnstudio 200 g color no 04 plumb/army/rust drops crochet hook size 9 mm / us m/13 or the hook needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 3 loops in the width x 4 row in the hight = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
